ActCanada Transportation Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Air Passenger Protection Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the AIR PASSENGER PROTECTION REGULATIONS in order to (1) require air carriers to provide passengers affected by flight cancellations or lengthy delays due to situations outside the carrierâ€™s control with a confirmed reservation on the next available flight that is operated by them or a partner carrier; (2) require air carriers to provide a refund or alternate travel arrangements when the carrier cannot provide a confirmed reservation within 48 hours; and (3) specify the refund coverage, method, and deadline.
